data.description: confiugre which test files to run
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I don't like making wierd names for tests so that t/*.t runs them
    in the right order, so I wrote some stuff to populate the 'tests'
    WriteMakefile key for me. this module puts that all into one place
    so I can reuse it. With a t/test_manifest file I can specify the
    test files to run and in which order to run them.
